paper.title: On the formal specification and analysis for loosely connected processes
paper.venue: Proceedings of the International Conference on Mathematical Studies of Information Processing
paper.abstract: Two formulations for synchronization problems, called "system of processes" and "synchronization graphs" are introduced in this paper. These are used to express inherent formal properties for such systems and give a set of inherent requirements for the mutual exclusion problem. Results include two theorems on common data requirements for mutual exclusion.
